name: Slime Garden
description:
Slime Garden is a contemplative game in which you explore a procedural world and meet its joyful inhabitants.

The game is geared toward sharing your discoveries and the only action you can perform is taking a picture which pauses the game, gives you a description of what is on it and gives you the possibility to share it on Twitter or save it locally.

Reach the center of the island to regenerate it.

Keyboard controls :
      WASD / ZQSD - Move
      Mouse - Look
      Escape - Deactivate / Activate grass
      Space - Take a picture
            1 Share to Twitter
            2 Save locally
            3 Return to game

Joystick controls :
      Left Joystick - Move
      Right Joystick - Look
      Start - Deactivate / Activate grass
      A - Take a picture
            Y Share to Twitter
            X Save locally
            B Return to game

Made by Constantin Liétard and Thomas Denis
Music  :  Acclimation (Studio Mix) by Water Features - https://soundcloud.com/nightvisionforever

OSX & Linux builds are untested
Try the CPU Only version if the terrain is not generated
